title: Just Cause 2
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   As agent Rico Rodriguez, your orders are to find and kill your friend and mentor who has disappeared on the island paradise of Panau. With the unique grapple and parachute combo, BASE jump, hijack and create your own high-speed stunts. With 400 square miles of rugged terrain and hundreds of weapons and vehicles, Just Cause 2 defies gravity and belief.

childDownloads.title: Agency Hovercraft
childDownloads.description: The ultimate in amphibious transport, the Agency Hovercraft is the most flexible form of transport in the game. Steered by a thrust-based engine for smooth and agile movement, the vehicle is as comfortable on land as off. Equipped with a turret-mounted grenade launcher, you’re guaranteed to blow your opposition out of the water.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Black Market Aerial Pack
childDownloads.description: With the Black Market Aerial Pack you get these cool items:  - F-33 DragonFly Jet Fighter: With quad-mounted miniguns and double missile launchers, this agile bird is the definite ruler of the skies, and packs a serious punch to land based targets as well.  - Dual Parachute Thrusters: Take to the air for longer! The Dual Parachute Thrusters when mounted to the parachute rig provides bursts of forward momentum to extend airtime.  - Multi-lock Missile Launcher: This highly sophisticated weapon of destruction allows you to lock up to four targets and unleash a barrage of homing missiles to take care of all your troubles. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Black Market 'Boom' Pack
childDownloads.description: With the Black Market 'Boom' Pack you get these cool items:  - Quad Rocket Launcher: Combine a rocket launcher with a shotgun and you've got yourself the powerful Quad Rocket Launcher - expect some collateral damage!  - Cluster Bomb Launcher: A natural progression of the grenade launcher, the Cluster Bomb Launcher is a small-scale weapon of mass destruction for personal use.   - Air Propulsion Gun: Courtesy of the Agency Propulsion Labs, this gun was originally designed as a jet engine but was soon repurposed for the weapons division where the Air Propulsion Gun was born. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Bull’s Eye Assault Rifle
childDownloads.description: More powerful than the standard assault rifle, this lightweight and lethal automatic rifle features increased accuracy in close combat and a higher magnification scope.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Chaos Parachute
childDownloads.description: Featuring a skull motif, make an entrance no one will forget … should you leave anyone alive to remember.

childDownloads.title: Chevalier Classic
childDownloads.description: No agent should be without a hot set of wheels and with an increased top speed and superior handling, you can arrive at your destination in style or make a guaranteed quick getaway.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Chevalier Ice Breaker
childDownloads.description: Bring on the chaos in Panau with a pimped-up Ice Cream Van. Featuring a sturdy front ram, side skirts and greater top speed, you have the perfect tool for causing some serious fender-benders. This extreme makeover also includes a jingle to match.

childDownloads.title: I 'heart' Panau
childDownloads.description: Been there, done that, gotta have that T-shirt! The classic Panau tourist T-shirt.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2
childDownloads.description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   As agent Rico Rodriguez, your orders are to find and kill your friend and mentor who has disappeared on the island paradise of Panau. With the unique grapple and parachute combo, BASE jump, hijack and create your own high-speed stunts. With 400 square miles of rugged terrain and hundreds of weapons and vehicles, Just Cause 2 defies gravity and belief.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 An Island In Chaos Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Enter the Just Cause 2 An Island In Chaos trailer, exploding onto the scene without any regard for military property, or in fact any kind of property whatsoever. If it goes bang, catches fire, explodes, breaks into little pieces, breaks into big pieces, can be dragged behind a sports car/helicopter/fighter jet/speed boat or motorcycle... we make it happen.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 Demo
childDownloads.description: Prepare yourself for some extreme chaos creation in this non-stop adrenalin-fuelled demo of Just Cause 2. Whether freefalling from thousands of feet, hijacking enemy fighters in mid-air or simply blasting your way through military compounds on the ground, as agent Rico Rodriguez you’re guaranteed to leave your mark on the tropical island of Panau. With literally hundreds of weapons, vehicles and collectables to discover and near unlimited possibilities for creative fun, you’ll soon find this vast playground is only a tiny portion of what the full game has to offer. Grab a parachute and ready your grapple... it’s time to cause some chaos!

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 Demo Out Now Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Featuring a massive 35 square miles of true sandbox fun - a vast expanse of stunning, sun-scorched desert packed with towns, villages, military installations, mountain ranges, missions and more. Hunt down and assassinate one of the game’s 50 military colonels; devastate military bases, bio fuel chambers, government infrastructure and that’s just for starters. Hijack tuk tuks, military 4x4s, mopeds, helicopter gunships, light aircraft, mini vans and countless other military and civilian vehicles; test out your BASE jumping skills freefalling from desert outcrops or from burning planes at 20,000 feet; and try your hands at a full, multi-stage mission, assaulting a government radar facility culminating in an unforgettable desert car chase.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 Desert Gameplay Walkthrough Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: This 10 minutes of footage will have you on the edge of your seat as Rico disregards all concern for military property, hurling a motorcycle at high speed through a broadcast tower, before stealing a tank, storming a radar facility and ultimately kidnapping a witness on his way to testify against one of Panau’s faction leaders.  Expect explosions, beautiful desert vistas, high speed action, even more explosions and of course, a healthy dose of trademark Just Cause 2 chaos.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 E3 2009 Debut Trailer  (HD)
childDownloads.description: The orders are simple: hunt down and execute a rogue agent that has stolen top-secret intelligence and millions in agency cash. For agent Rico Rodriguez, the mission is anything but routine. The target is Tom Sheldon, Rico’s former commanding officer, mentor and friend. A man who knows Rico better than he knows himself.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 Freedom and Chaos Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Just Cause 2 gives you the freedom to take on the world in more ways than you can possibly imagine. Freedom to decide where to go: snow-topped mountain ski resorts, sun-kissed tropical beaches, beached oil tankers, floating brothels or lost Japanese WWII soldiers on ‘skull’ island. Freedom to accept any mission: work for any of the three island factions, choose from almost 200 missions, challenges, assassinations and more. Freedom to bend reality to your cause: surf jet fighters into oil rigs, ‘helicopter hop’ from the burning wreckage of your aircraft and hijack your pursuer, devastate heavily defended military installations with nothing but your grapple. Just Cause 2 gives you the freedom to make the game your own.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 Island of Panau Mini Documentary (HD)
childDownloads.description: Behind the scenes at Avalanche Studios, discover some of the more unusual sights on the island of Panau and learn more about its shady past.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 Launch Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Using a unique grapple and parachute combination, there is no vertical limit as the air becomes your playground: grapple a passing plane in flight, hijack helicopters, BASE jump from the tallest buildings or mountains and leave a trail of chaos and destruction in your wake. Just Cause 2 offers the freedom to tackle missions any way you choose and, with over 100 vehicles and countless upgrades and collectibles, the choices for relentless adrenaline-fuelled action are limitless.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 No Ordinary Mission Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Rico's one hell of a guy. He's the best in his field. There's not a situation he isn't ready for...and that's in part down to his grapple. Fixed to his left arm it's always there when he needs it. Whether that's yanking an enemy from a moving vehicle, slingshotting from one skyscraper to another, or simply attaching a speed boat to a chopper for high altitude transit, it's the one piece of equipment he wouldn't live without...and we wouldn't want him to. In this trailer...we show you why.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 The Grapple Mini Documentary (HD)
childDownloads.description: Behind the scenes at Avalanche Studios, get a lesson in tethering object together, using the dual hook, sling-shotting with the parachute to zip around the environment, some creative combat techniques, gravity defying stunts and more.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 Vehicle Stunts Mini Documentary (HD)
childDownloads.description: Ever wanted to see a man surfing on a personal jet thousands of feet in the air grapple to a passing passenger plane, or see what happens when a speeding jeep is tethered to a passing statue of Panau’s most powerful dictator? How about the adrenalin-pumping excitement of a tumbling fireball of calamity caused by a freshly shot out tire of a pursuing enemy vehicle whilst our man effortlessly takes cover hanging from the front of another? In this mini doc you’ll see all this, that and then some. You’ve seen sandbox freedom before, but never like this.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 Vertical Gameplay Mini Documentary (HD)
childDownloads.description: Behind the scenes at Avalanche Studios, the development team share secrets and explain the stomach-churning vertical gameplay unique to Just Cause 2.

childDownloads.title: Just Cause 2 Visit Panau Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Visit the island paradise of Panau and have the experience of a lifetime. Discover if its majestic mountains, idyllic deserts, white sand beaches and lush jungles actually co-exist in harmony.

childDownloads.title: Monster Truck
childDownloads.description: The usefulness of an oversized monster truck when destabilizing small countries is clearly evident.

childDownloads.title: Rico Outfit
childDownloads.description: Become Agent 'Rico Rodriguez' with his full Just Cause 2 gear. This complete outfit includes leather vest with scorpion motif, grapple, distressed jeans and trademark leather boots. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Rico’s Signature Gun
childDownloads.description: Customised by the Agency and adapted for Rico’s shooting style, this deadly accurate and powerful pistol packs a punch with precision, power and flair.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Scorpion Animated Pet
childDownloads.description: Opt for a more unusual companion with this Just Cause 2 scorpion, captured in the wild desert plains of Panau.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Tom Sheldon Hawaiian Shirt
childDownloads.description: If you're going to spend as much time on Panau as Rico's mentor Tom Sheldon, you're going to need to look the part. Blend in seamlessly undercover with his classic Hawaiian shirt.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Tom Sheldon Hawaiian Shirt
childDownloads.description: If you're going to spend as much time on Panau as Rico's mentor Tom Sheldon, you're going to need to look the part. Blend in seamlessly undercover with his classic Hawaiian shirt.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: T-shirt - Grapple
childDownloads.description: Show your support for Just Cause 2 with this official T-shirt. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
